overview: Eric is the COO, the CFO and a co-founder of ePrep, Inc. He is a seasoned internet entrepreneur and management executive. In 2000, Eric founded Ivysport.com, the Ivy League’s official retail and brand partner. Prior to Ivysport, he joined the founding team of KORE Partners as CEO and rapidly grew the digital consultancy to market leadership in Southern California before a successful sale of the business. Prior to his work with KORE, Eric held senior management positions at EMI Music and Home Box Office, where he oversaw new business development and strategic planning efforts focused in technology. He began his career in investment banking with Smith Barney. Eric graduated from Princeton University in 1990 with an AB in Economics. He earned an MBA from the Stern School of Business at New York University in 1997. Eric lives in Southern California with his wife and two children.
